wiki.content:
"Flashing Lights" is a song by American rap artist Kanye West. It was released on November 22, 2007 as the fourth single for his third studio album, Graduation. The song was co-produced by Eric Hudson and features R&B singer Dwele as well as additional vocals provided by Connie Mitchell of Sneaky Sound System.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Flashing Lights" is a song by American rap artist Kanye West. It was released on November 22, 2007 as the fourth single for his third studio album, Graduation. The song was co-produced by Eric Hudson and features R&B singer Dwele as well as additional vocals provided by Connie Mitchell of Sneaky Sound System.
